form_error_invalid: This field is invalid and cannot be validated due to an invalid validation.
form_error_min: A minimum of {MIN} values is required.
form_error_max: A maximum of {MAX} values is allowed.
form_error_min_value: This field requires a minimum value of {MIN_VALUE}.
form_error_max_value: This field allows a maximum value of {MAX_VALUE}.
form_error_min_length: This field requires a minimum of {MIN_LENGTH} characters.
form_error_max_length: This field allows a maximum of {MAX_LENGTH} characters.
form_error_regex: The value does not match the required pattern, {REGEX}.
form_error_boolean: This field required a boolean value. (true or false)
form_error_binary: The binary value of this field is not correct.
form_error_submit: An unknown error occurred while submitting the form.
form_error_upload: An unknown error occurred while uploading {FILE}.
form_error_upload_general: An unknown error occurred while uploading.
tests_extra_reports_id_placeholder: Paste an report ID & press enter
tests_extra_reports_error_duplicate: A report with the same ID already exists.
